name: INSearchForNotebookItemsIntent
desc: A request to search for notes, tasks, and reminders.

items.name: init(title: INSpeakableString?, content: String?, itemType: INNotebookItemType, status: INTaskStatus, location: CLPlacemark?, locationSearchType: INLocationSearchType, dateTime: INDateComponentsRange?, dateSearchType: INDateSearchType, temporalEventTriggerTypes: INTemporalEventTriggerTypeOptions, taskPriority: INTaskPriority, notebookItemIdentifier: String?)
var itemType: INNotebookItemType
items.desc: The type of items to include in your search.

items.name: enum INNotebookItemType
items.desc: Constants indicating the types of items to search.

items.name: var title: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The title text to search for in a note, task, or task list.

items.name: var content: String?
items.desc: The text to search for in the body of a note.

items.name: var status: INTaskStatus
items.desc: The completion state to look for when searching for tasks.

items.name: enum INTaskStatus
items.desc: Constants indicating the completion state of a task.

items.name: var location: CLPlacemark?
items.desc: The value to use when searching for location-triggered reminders.

items.name: var locationSearchType: INLocationSearchType
items.desc: An indicator of how to apply location values to your search.

items.name: enum INLocationSearchType
items.desc: Constants indicating the type of location-based search to perform.

items.name: var dateTime: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The value to use when performing date-based searches.

items.name: var dateSearchType: INDateSearchType
items.desc: An indicator of how to apply date values to your search.

items.name: enum INDateSearchType
items.desc: Constants indicating the type of date-based search to perform.

items.name: var notebookItemIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The unique identifier that your app assigned to the item.

items.name: enum INTaskPriority
items.desc: Constants indicating the priority for a task.

items.name: struct INTemporalEventTriggerTypeOptions
items.desc: Constants indicating how often to trigger an event.
